headline: WTW launches Radar Fusion to accelerate innovative commercial underwriting for sustainable growth
summary: Augmented underwriting technology, Radar Fusion, helps insurers streamline and scale underwriting to improve decision-making in a fast-changing marketNEW YORK, Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WTW (NASDAQ: WTW) has announced the launch of Radar Fusion, developed to help make commercial underwriting faster, smarter, and more strategically aligned. The cloud-native underwriting solution, which delivers data, analytics, and real-time insights that support expert judgment at pace – enhancing, not r

headline: 4 Stocks to Watch From the Thriving Insurance Brokerage Industry
summary: Zacks Insurance Brokerage players like BRO, MMC, WTW and AON are likely to benefit from increased demand for insurance products, strategic acquisitions and the adoption of technology.

headline: Workers less happy, more informed with company benefits
summary: A new global survey from WTW found that 84% of respondents are “well informed” about their benefits but only 61% are satisfied with them.
